website_summaries.verdict: Simple style in a silver-tone watch with a white face. Owners acknowledge it has a slightly high price, but still a good value.
pros: Watch powers up through movement of your body
Customers like the size of the watch face
Looks like a more expensive watch
cons: Some owners say the watch is a little heavy to wear for long periods

customer_reviews.title: Order this watch the price is worth it,
customer_reviews.text: Thanks Amazon I hope I can have the right words to describe this amazing watch today. I have been a seiko watch enthusiast since 1970 , which I still have, needs a battery but still works. Don't delay getting this model, if you like heavy large face watches this ones for you. The plus is not needing a battery replacement ever, the online pictures don't do it justice it's gorgeous. I love the day indicator and the easy way to check the charge level. Thanks again Amazon this was a home run for me.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Carlin

customer_reviews.title: Coutura Kinetic Watch
customer_reviews.text: A much higher quality watch than my previous Seiko Kinetic which finally needed replaced after thirty years of daily wear! The day of the week is a very nice feature. All the documentation and warranty from Seiko USA was included with the watch. My only issue is the watch is more difficult to read due to the smaller hour and minute dials, but this is more the fault of my 82 year old eyes than the watch. Highly recommend the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Kinetic watch, runs on movement, difficult to power up.
customer_reviews.text: This watch will not run. I have been swinging it on my arm for an hour and it will not stay moving. It is a beautiful watch. I wish it came in a version with a regular battery.
customer_reviews.author: Alice R

customer_reviews.title: Seiko kinetic.
customer_reviews.text: Another fabulous watch from Seiko. Great size not too big, or too small, and very accurate time keeping.
customer_reviews.author: eric lewis

customer_reviews.title: Time on my Hand
customer_reviews.text: A handsome watch with super clarity of time and date. Ran up to 6 months reserve in less than a week of wear. It is heavy to be sure, but I accept that as it is also quite durable.
customer_reviews.author: Don G.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch good price . Hard to charge...
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous watch great price little heavy but super nice takes a good while to get it charger I've yet to get it charged past 2 day reserve..... And have worn it alot. That would be my only complaint so far
customer_reviews.author: Cdub

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this watch. I have 12 Seikos in my collection and they are all kinetic, automatic or solar. This is now my new favorite for dress to casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: bman

customer_reviews.title: Never fully charged
customer_reviews.text: Did not ever seem to get full charge.. I did not wear it for 3 says and found it fully discharged. Wore it for a day and it did not make it over night..
customer_reviews.author: Rorkie

customer_reviews.title: The design and weight are very comfortable. But
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for the Kinetic movement. It works well. The design and weight are very comfortable. But, far from swiss finishing quality, like Tissot or alike. In all case, good choice.
customer_reviews.author: CRISTIAN IMBARACK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully crafted and designed for someone with a modest budget
customer_reviews.author: Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Quality and looks are good. Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Quality and looks are good. Heavy, but it doesn't bother me. I wanted masculine watch, got it and very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: daina

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its a seiko, but the decorative blue gem in the crown broke on second day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very solid watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is available at major department stores and as such can be tried. This is a kinetic watch which with improved mechanism. Design is very nice - size is perfect, weight is on a heavy side, but is not too heavy; hands glow; background color is very nice. Band is very simple, but comfortable. Amazon price is good. Overall, a very solid watch.
customer_reviews.author: pavelTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch! I got it for a gift so I am not sure how well it works yet, but I am happy with the product thus far!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: It's a very nice watch, but it didn't have the plastic around ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice watch, but it didn't have the plastic around the buckle that it had at the store, so hopefully no one wore it, and hopefully it will be fine for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Harris

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that it is charged my movement
customer_reviews.text: The face of the watch is quite large for my wrist. Also, the watch is about 1cm thick and quite heavy. However, I like the fact that it is charged my movement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Seiko Men's SRN063 Coutura Kinetic Retrograde Silver-Tone Stainless Steel Watch
product_meta.description:
Coutura Kinetic Retrograde. A stylish timepiece, the stunning look of this watch is matched only by its precision performance. Designed with a stainless steel case and bracelet. The most advanced watch technology, Seiko Kinetic, is powered by the movement of your body, with no battery change required. This environmentally friendly timepiece features a silver dial with blue accents, day/date calendar, luminous hands, and is protected with a durable sapphire crystal. 6 month power reserve. Screw down see-through case back. Cabochon crown. 100 meters water resistant.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :5 x 5 x 5 inches; 12 Ounces
 * Item model number :SRN063
 * Department :Mens
 * Batteries :1 Lithium Metal batteries required.
 * Date First Available :October 14, 2014
 * Manufacturer :Seiko Watch Corporation
 * ASIN :B011RCG8P0

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};

    *  #639011 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.1 out of 5 stars38 ratings Coutura Kinetic Retrograde. A stylish timepiece, the stunning look of this watch is matched only by its precision performance. Designed with a stainless steel case and bracelet. The most advanced watch technology, Seiko Kinetic, is powered by the movement of your body, with no battery change required. This environmentally friendly timepiece features a silver dial with blue accents, day/date calendar, luminous hands, and is protected with a durable sapphire crystal. 6 month power reserve. Screw down see-through case back. Cabochon crown. 100 meters water resistant.
feature_bullets: Silver-tone watch featuring white dial with guilloche weekday subdial, date window, and blue hands
43 mm stainless steel case with synthetic sapphire dial window
Japanese quartz movement with analog display
Stainless steel band with push-button clasp
Water resistant to 100 m (330 ft): In general, suitable for swimming and snorkeling, but not scuba diving
